review: We received the Fire TV Stick on time and by Friday afternoon 2 days later it had paid for itself by the TV series we watched.  I have already put several things on my "watch list".  This TV stick should be a no brainer buy for anyone with Prime Membership. We love it.

review: The single time it successfully maintained a WiFi connection for more than 3 mins it was wonderful. Unfortunately it is virtually impossible to maintain the connection despite a strong signal strength.  Other devices in the same spot have no problem. No internet connection renders the whole thing useless.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not quite what I was hoping. The apps you can download are just the regular android apps, so built for lower resolutions or don't do what you're going to want from a TV app. The Amazon integration is good, but I would like better TV-type apps supported. Especially things like Twitch because it's an Amazon company.Also, a good quality DLNA client would go a long way. Especially if it's built in.
